avatar_unit_info_card_abilites_strings.localised_string:
Armour-Piercing Arrows. 
 
 Your avatar and his bodyguard shoot bodkin-style arrows designed to penetrate armour.
Armour Penetration. \n \n Melee attacks penetrate armour.
Stealth Ability. \n \n When activated, this ability allows the unit to remain hidden whilst running for a short period.
Bamboo Wall. \n \n During the deployment phase, the unit can deploy a fixed barrier to shelter from cavalry behind.
Banzai Ability. \n \n When activated, boosts the unit's melee attack and charge bonus, and gives them unbreakable morale for a short time.
Blinding Grenades. \n \n Blinding grenades temporarily disable the target unit.
Swooping Crane Ability. \n \n When this ability is activated, the unit will wheel in a circular formation maintaining a steady fire on the target unit.
Enable Fire Arrows. \n \n When activated, fire arrows increase the lethality of this unit's shots and can also ignite wooden buildings.
Fire By Rank Ability. \n \n A more efficient firing drill.

Kisho Training. 
 
 During the deployment phase, this unit is able to deploy outside of the deployment area. 
 
 May not deploy too close to a key building.
Inspire Ability. \n \n When activated, allows the unit to boost the morale, melee attack and accuracy of a single unit.
Pavise. \n \n During the deployment phase, the unit can deploy a fixed barrier to shelter behind.

Rally Ability. 
 
 When activated, the rally ability will restore nearby routing units to order (shattered units are not affected). 
 
 Units nearby which aren't routing will receive a morale bonus whilst rally is active.
Rapid Volley Ability. \n \n When active, greatly increases reload rate for a short period.

Scare Nearby Enemies. 
 
 Enemies close to the unit will suffer a morale penalty. 
 
 This effect is always active.

Snipe Ability. 
 
 If hidden already, the unit can shoot without betraying its position. 
 
 Only works whilst stationary.

Stand and Fight Ability. 
 
 When activated, your avatar will dismount to encourage units near to him, boosting their morale, melee attack and reload speed. 
 
 The ability will remain active until cancelled. 
 
 Your avatar is unable to move whilst Stand and Fight is active.
Enable Warcry Ability. \n \n When activated, reduces the morale, melee defence and movement speed of enemy units close to the unit.
Whistling Arrows. \n \n When activated, whistling arrows reduce the morale, melee attack and reload speed of enemy units targeted by them.

Avatar Bow. 
 
 Your avatar and his bodyguard can shoot bows from horseback.

Increased Avatar Bodyguard Unit Size. 
 
 The number of men in your avatar's personal guard is increased.
Improved Spotting Range. \n \n The range at which this unit spot hidden enemies is increased.
No Penalty Versus Spears. \n \n Your avatar and his bodyguard ignore the penalty suffered by all other cavalry units when attacking enemies armed with spears.
Increased Damage \n \n The amount of damage inflicted by this unit's missiles is increased.

Replenish Unit Between Battles. 
 
 Any casualties suffered in a previous battle will be restored before the next battle.

Increased Fatigue Resistance. 
 
 Reduces the rate at which the unit becomes fatigued. 
 
 Fatigue impairs speed, morale and fighting ability.
Improved Speed. \n \n Increased unit movement speed.
